dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- John Wiley & Sons
dmca.body:
111 River Street, 3-05
Hoboken, NJ 07030-5774
www.wiley.com 

TEL 201.748.6014
FAX 201.748.6500
E-MAIL pmurphy@wiley.com

Patrick M. Murphy
Paralegal
 
John Wiley & Sons, Inc. 
Publishers Since 1807
 
January 4, 2007
 
Google, Inc. 
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, CA 94043
VIA FAX: (650) 963-3255

To Whom it May Concern: 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named John Wiley & Sons, Inc., a global publisher of books, journals, and other products, or one of its related companies ("Wiley").
 
We recently learned that an unauthorized copy of the material listed below is available for download on a website hosted by your company at the following URL address:

http://ebooks82.blogspot.com/2006/12/about-285-ebooks.html
 
The material is as follows:
 
1. ACT! 2005 For Dummies (ISBN 0764575325) by Karen Fredricks 
2. Adobe Acrobat 6 PDF For Dummies (ISBN 0764537601) by Greg Harvey 
3. Adobe Premiere Elements For Dummies (ISBN 0764578812) by Keith Underdahl 
4. Blocking Spam & Spyware For Dummies (ISBN 0764575910) by Peter Gregory 
5. Building a Web Site For Dummies, (ISBN 0764571443) by David Crowder 
6. Building Research Tools With Google For Dummies (ISBN 076457809X) by Harold Davis 
7. Building Your Business with Google For Dummies, (ISBN 0764571435) by Brad Hill 
8. Buying a Computer For Dummies (ISBN 0764598 18X) by Dan Gookin
9. Buzz Marketing with Blogs For Dummies, (ISBN 076458457X) by Susannah Gardner 
10. C For Dummies Second Edition (ISBN 0764570684) by Dan Gookin 
11. C++ For Dummies (ISBN 0764568523) by Stephen Davis 
12. Cleaning Windows XP For Dummies (ISBN 076457549X) by Allen Wyatt 
13. Creating Family Web Sites For Dummies (ISBN 076457938X) by Janine Warner 
14. Creating Web Pages All-in-One Desk Reference For Dummies, (ISBN 0764543458) by Emily Vander Veer 
15. Creating Web Pages For Dummies (ISBN 0764573276) by Bud Smith 
16. CSS Web Design For Dummies (ISBN 0764584251) by Richard Mansfield 
17. Digital Video For Dummies (ISBN 0471782785) by Keith Underdahl 
18. eBay Bargain Shopping For Dummies (ISBN 0764540807) by Marsha Collier 
19. Europe For Dummies (ISBN 0764575295) by Reid Bramblett 
20. FileMaker Pro 7 Bible (ISBN 0764543470) by Steven Schwartz 
21. Firewalls For Dummies (ISBN 0764540483) by Brian Komar 
22. GPS For Dummies, (ISBN 0764569333) by Joel McNamara 
23. Hacking For Dummies (ISBN 076455784X) by Kevrn Beaver 
24. HDTV For Dummies, (ISBN 0764575864) by Danny Briere 
25. Home Networking For Dummies (ISBN 0764588494) by Kathy Ivens 
26. HTML 4 For Dummies (ISBN 0764589172) by Ed Tittel 
27. iLife
